query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mttr_mtbf_alert_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  threshold_id INT NOT NULL,
  target_type ENUM('device','machine','production_line') NOT NULL,
  target_id INT NOT NULL,
  target_name VARCHAR(255),
  alert_type ENUM('mttr_warning','mttr_critical','mtbf_warning','mtbf_critical','availability_warning','availability_critical') NOT NULL,
  current_value DECIMAL(15, 4),
  threshold_value DECIMAL(15, 4),
  message TEXT,
  email_sent INT DEFAULT 0,
  telegram_sent INT DEFAULT 0,
  acknowledged_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  acknowledged_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_threshold_id (threshold_id),
  INDEX idx_target (target_type, target_id),
  INDEX idx_alert_type (alert_type),
  INDEX idx_created_at (created_at)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mttr_mtbf_alert_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  threshold_id INT NOT NULL,
  target_type ENUM('device','machine','production_line') NOT NULL,
  target_id INT NOT NULL,
  target_name VARCHAR(255),
  alert_type ENUM('mttr_warning','mttr_critical','mtbf_warning','mtbf_critical','availability_warning','availability_critical') NOT NULL,
  current_value DECIMAL(15, 4),
  threshold_value DECIMAL(15, 4),
  message TEXT,
  email_sent INT DEFAULT 0,
  telegram_sent INT DEFAULT 0,
  acknowledged_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  acknowledged_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_threshold_id (threshold_id),
  INDEX idx_target (target_type, target_id),
  INDEX idx_alert_type (alert_type),
  INDEX idx_created_at (created_at)
);
